text: ♪ I'm so used to being broke

it has the ability to cool itself down.
We sweat, our blood vessels dilate,
and our heart rate increases...
Mom! Why don't we have air-conditioning?
Because we live in Seattle.
Please go get dressed.
...and our body releases as much excess heat as it can.
I thought Gen Z was all about climate conservation.

and spot-on hashtags.
Oh, and calling you "bestie" as an insult.

73 degrees. No heat waves.

our bodies have to work overtime...

73 degrees, Mer.

"Meant to be."
In Yiddish.
I had my first miscarriage

And then it got worse.
Jonathan was diagnosed with malignant mesothelioma.

When Jonathan passed away,
I couldn't imagine being a parent without him.

and I realized that
